Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: “Kanichilisia mbu ndalaboola khu- Nyasaye halali obwatoto, emalile okhubeetsela nende ebifune okhurula khu Nyasaye wenyu omulesi kho lekhula Abana ba Israili babe ninasi
(Firaun) Nabola mbu; “Noli niwitsile nende eshilolelo nakhashirerekhwo toto noli mubandu ababoolanga obulaamba”
Nasukuna indabushi yiyie, mana nikalukhana inzukha yatoto
Ne narusia omukhono kukwe, nikukalukhana	omulafu	tswe khubakuhenganga
Abakhongo mubandu ba Firaun nibaboola mbu; “Toto uno ni Omulosi Omumanyi muno.”
Yenya okhubarusia mushialo shienyu, kho mulola murie
Nibaboola; “Muleshe hatiti ye nende Omusiani wabu, ne ruma abakhung’asinjia Abandu mumatokho.”
Abalosi nibetsa khu Firaun, nibaboola mbu; “khwitsa okhunyoola omurungo nikali mbu khushila
Naboola mbu; “ Eeh! Efuchilila. Ne mwitsa okhuba abacheni banje”
Nibaboola mbu ; “Ewe Musa koo, newe witsa okhusukuna nohomba efwe khuranjilile?”
Musa naboola mbu ; “Enywe sukune” (ranjilile) Kho olwabasukuna belimia tsimoni tsiabandu mana nibabarisia nenibetsa nende obulosi obukhongo
Ne nikhufimbulila Musa mbu “sukuna indambushi yiyio” Mana ni imila biosi ebiabali nibakholele
Obwatoto nibulolekha, ne nibibiya biosi ebia bakholanga
Kho nibashilwa eyo, mana nibatong’a abatiti
